title: Client DC's In Champ Select
body:
Over the past couple of months my client will DC for no apparent during champ select. The lock in button will be grey and I am unable to lock in any champion. Its been getting more and more frequent and I can expect this at least once a day. This has made me throw away promo games and lose LP for no apparent reason. Is this happening to anyone else?

All internet in my computer is fine during the champ select it just lags out{{champion:30}}

replies.body:
It sounds like you're losing sync during champion select and getting blocked from reaching the matchmaknig service.  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to auto-config your Firewall settings in case that might be the culprit.  

Though your internet seems fine, you can still have issues accessing specific servers.  Run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide as well to rule out possibilities.  Let me know if you have any questions!
